name: CreatinineClearance
title: Creatinine Clearance
purpose: (Clinical Focus: LOINC codes specifically for creatinine clearance),(Data Element Scope: OBSERVATION:),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes all LOINC codes for creatinine clearance expressed as ml/min, including those normalized for body surface area (1.73 sq M)),(Exclusion Criteria: LOINC codes for estimated glomerular filtration rate (eGFR))
